fact.description: The match has started.
Italy to take a throw-in in Uruguay territory.
Uruguay awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marco Rodriguez signals a Uruguay throw-in in Italy's half.
Can Uruguay get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Italy's half?
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Italy in their own half.
Italy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Uruguay.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Uruguay.
Important block from the Italy defence as Alvaro Gonzalez fires in a strike for Uruguay.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Italy in their own half.
Can Italy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Uruguay's half?
Marco Rodriguez signals a Italy throw-in in Uruguay's half.
Free kick Italy.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Italy.
Italy's Andrea Pirlo gets in a shot on goal at Estadio das Dunas. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Italy.
Uruguay awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Italy at Estadio das Dunas.
Marco Rodriguez blows against Uruguay's Luis Suarez for offside.
Throw-in for Italy in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Uruguay goal kick.
Throw-in Italy.
Free kick Italy.
Marco Rodriguez awards Uruguay a goal kick.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Uruguay in their own half.
Italy to take a throw-in in Uruguay territory.
Uruguay have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Italy at Estadio das Dunas.
Italy's Ciro Immobile is whistled for offside at Estadio das Dunas.
Uruguay awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Uruguay.
Marco Rodriguez awards Italy a goal kick.
Mario Balotelli (Italy) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Ball safe as Uruguay is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Uruguay awarded a free kick in their own half.
Claudio Marchisio (Italy) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Italy in their own half.
Italy's Andrea Barzagli gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Uruguay defender.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Uruguay in their own half.
Mario Balotelli of Italy gets in a strike, but is off target.
Uruguay have a goal kick.
Marco Rodriguez signals a Italy throw-in in Uruguay's half.
Throw-in for Uruguay at Estadio das Dunas.
Italy are coming forward and Ciro Immobile gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Uruguay goal kick.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Uruguay in their own half.
Italy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Uruguay at Estadio das Dunas.
Luis Suarez of Uruguay smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Nicolas Lodeiro for Uruguay drives towards goal at Estadio das Dunas. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Mario Balotelli is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Play has been resumed at Estadio das Dunas.
Mario Balotelli is back on his feet again.
Free kick Uruguay.
Can Uruguay get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Italy's half?
Ball safe as Italy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Italy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Uruguay's Martin Caceres gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Marco Rodriguez awards Italy a goal kick.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Italy in their own half.
Throw-in for Italy close to the penalty box.
Italy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Uruguay.
Ball safe as Uruguay is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Uruguay.
Uruguay have been awarded a corner by Marco Rodriguez.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Italy in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Matteo Darmian for Italy who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Matteo Darmian returns to the field for Italy after picking up a slight injury.
The first-half has come to a close in Natal.
Marco Parolo is replacing Mario Balotelli for Italy at Estadio das Dunas.
Oscar Tabarez is making the team's first substitution at Estadio das Dunas with Maxi Pereira replacing Nicolas Lodeiro.
Free kick Italy.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the first half.
Throw-in for Uruguay at Estadio das Dunas.
Marco Rodriguez has blown to resume play in Natal.
Egidio Arevalo (Uruguay) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Marco Rodriguez waits before resuming play because Martin Caceres for Uruguay is still down.
Play has been resumed.
Marco Rodriguez signals a throw-in for Italy, close to Uruguay's area.
Throw-in Uruguay.
Uruguay to take a throw-in in Italy territory.
Italy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Uruguay.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Uruguay in their own half.
Uruguay are pushing forward but Luis Suarez's finish is wide of the goal.
Italy have a goal kick.
Italy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Martin Caceres has recovered and rejoins the match in Natal.
Throw-in for Italy in their own half.
Italy to take a throw-in in Uruguay territory.
Claudio Marchisio (Italy) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Italy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Uruguay's half?
Goal kick for Uruguay at Estadio das Dunas.
Free kick Uruguay.
Marco Rodriguez signals a Uruguay throw-in in Italy's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Italy goal kick.
Goal kick for Uruguay at Estadio das Dunas.
In Natal Uruguay attack through Cristian Rodriguez. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Italy goal kick.
Italy are down to 10 men after Claudio Marchisio has been shown a red card.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Uruguay.
Italy needs to be cautious. Uruguay have an attacking throw-in.
Marco Rodriguez awards Italy a goal kick.
Italy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Italy in their own half.
Uruguay to take a throw-in in Italy territory.
Uruguay make their second substitution with Christian Stuani replacing Alvaro Pereira.
Uruguay awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marco Rodriguez signals a Uruguay throw-in in Italy's half.
Italy's Andrea Pirlo misses with an attempt on goal.
Uruguay have a goal kick.
Luis Suarez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Uruguay.
Corner awarded to Uruguay.
Ball goes out of play for a Italy goal kick.
Ciro Immobile (Italy) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Italy have been awarded a corner by Marco Rodriguez.
Throw-in Uruguay.
Ciro Immobile for Italy is whistled offside.
Italy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Antonio Cassano is on a sub for Ciro Immobile for Italy.
Ball safe as Italy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match at Estadio das Dunas has been interrupted briefly for a check on Marco Verratti, who is down injured.
Play is underway once more.
Marco Verratti (Italy) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Thiago Motta.
Can Uruguay get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Italy's half?
Uruguay to take a throw-in in Italy territory.
Uruguay are in shooting range from this free kick.
Mattia De Sciglio (Italy) gets a yellow card.
Oscar Tabarez (Uruguay) is making a third substitution, with Gaston Ramirez replacing Cristian Rodriguez.
Italy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Uruguay.
Diego Godin gets his shot on target but fails to score for Uruguay.
That's a fine assist from Gaston Ramirez.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Italy.
Andrea Pirlo (Italy) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Italy have been awarded a corner by Marco Rodriguez.
Throw-in for Uruguay in their own half.
Throw-in for Uruguay at Estadio das Dunas.
Marco Rodriguez signals a Italy throw-in in Uruguay's half.
Throw-in for Italy in their own half.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Uruguay in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the second half.
Marco Rodriguez awards Italy a goal kick.
Fernando Muslera for Uruguay has been booked by Marco Rodriguez and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick Italy.
Uruguay are coming forward and Luis Suarez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Italy at Estadio das Dunas.
Free kick Italy.
Ball safe as Uruguay is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
